column3: Guess another player's card (may not guess Guess): if correct they're out.
Compare with another player's card: the lesser card's holder is out. If equal, nobody's out.
May not be targeted by any cards until the next turn.
Force another player to drop and redraw their card.
Must be played if the other card in the hand is Drop or Swap; no other effect.
If this card is played or discarded, its holder is out.
